name: Where the Wild Things Are [Tumblr dash theme] v1
description: Tumblr dashboard theme, with custom 'new post' icons. Rawr!
additional_info:
From style 38198 by user 65323. The original hasn't been updated for 3 years, so it's doubtful that all of the selectors still target an element in the current dashboard. If that matters, tell me why and I'll repair it.

Icons only: style 90342
